TopicTitle: [0.17] Portable Landing Pads and Runways, Up to 2 km Long

Articles.Content:
It appears that the forum reboot resurrected this old thread. Updates can be found here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/23774-0-19-1-HL-Airship-and-Party-Experimentation-Center-New-Rigid-Envelope-Dodec

Because everyone wants their flying aircraft carrier, build your own with these parts! You can land or take off on them with most anything.

Also try our airship mod!

Need help with coding persistent detached parts! Click here to support!

Edited April 24, 2013 by Hooligan Labs

First! Hey man, awesome mod.

Continue the good work man.

And, whats the soundtrack called in the video?
'The Might of Baron', just added it to the video description.
It would be even cooler for it to be foldable!

It would be even cooler for it to be foldable!

True, but it would be even heavier due to the space-grade servos necessary to handle that much mass. I could look into that later.
I hope the Aviation lights pack sticks to them - ideal for night-landings!
How do I fly it and land it in the ocean to be an aircraft carrier?

That happend ALWAYS, what is this?!

Please give me the Craft file

I hope the Aviation lights pack sticks to them - ideal for night-landings!

True! I have stuck stuff to the sides no problem. Due to the sheer length of the runway it may be difficult to put lights at the end, the runway extends well outside of the assembly bay... If so, I could integrate the lights from another mod into my runway.

How do I fly it and land it in the ocean to be an aircraft carrier?

I don't know, try it! If it does not work I have heard there's a pontoon mod out there.

That happend ALWAYS, what is this?!

Please give me the Craft file

Sure, I'll upload it after I get out of work.

In the meantime, I'm guessing that you tried to load this into the VAB and then launched? If something clips with the launch tower the results are... spectacular. What I did was build it in the VAB, then copy the file from VAB to the Spaceplane Hanger in the KSP_win save folder.
Looking to build "Island Hopper" sites off planet. This looks to be just the thing.

It appears that the forum reboot resurrected this old thread. Updates can be found here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/23774-0-19-1-HL-Airship-and-Party-Experimentation-Center-New-Rigid-Envelope-Dodec
